blocks.name: opabid
blocks.content: The law of concretion. Special case of Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. (Contributed by NM, 14-Apr-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabid(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w0)
} = {
  elab2(hs0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w0)
  copsexg(s0, s1, cv(hs0), w0)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabid(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (< s0, s1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚Üî w0)
} = {
  elab2(hs0, < s0, s1 >, { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, w0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  opex(s0, s1)
  bicomd(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))), w0)
  copsexg(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(< s0, s1 >)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: elopab
blocks.content: Membership in a class abstraction of pairs. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm elopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantr(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, copab(s0, s1, w0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  exlimivv(s0, s1, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpbiri(c0 = < s0, s1 >, c0 ‚àà ùïå, < s0, s1 > ‚àà ùïå)
  opex(s0, s1)
  eleq1(c0, < s0, s1 >, universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c0, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0), (c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, c0 = < s0, s1 >)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, < s0, s1 >)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: opelopabsbALT
blocks.content: The law of concretion in terms of substitutions. Less general than ~ opelopabsb , but having a much shorter proof. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm opelopabsbALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s2, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s2, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s2, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s2, w0)), wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0))))
  bitri(wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0))))
  excom(s2, s3, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0))
  2exbii(s3, s2, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0), wa(wa(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0))
  anbi1i(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), w0, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  bitri(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wa(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))
  opth(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(s3))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  anbi12ci(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  equcom(s0, s2)
  equcom(s1, s3)
  elopab(s2, s3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
  2sb5(s1, s3, s0, s2, w0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opelopabsbALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (< s0, s1 > ‚àà { < s2, s3 > | w0 } ‚Üî[s1 / s3][s0 / s2]w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  3bitr4i(< s0, s1 > ‚àà { < s2, s3 > | w0 }, [s1 / s3][s0 / s2]w0, ‚àÉ(s2, ‚àÉ(s3,(< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 > ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,((s3 = s1 ‚àß s2 = s0)‚àß w0))))
  bitri(‚àÉ(s2, ‚àÉ(s3,(< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 > ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,((s3 = s1 ‚àß s2 = s0)‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,(< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 > ‚àß w0))))
  excom(s2, s3, (< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 > ‚àß w0))
  2exbii(s3, s2, (< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 > ‚àß w0), ((s3 = s1 ‚àß s2 = s0)‚àß w0))
  anbi1i(< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 >, w0, (s3 = s1 ‚àß s2 = s0))
  bitri(< s0, s1 > = < s2, s3 >, (s3 = s1 ‚àß s2 = s0), (s0 = s2 ‚àß s1 = s3))
  opth(s0, s1, s2, s3)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  anbi12ci(s0 = s2, s1 = s3, s3 = s1, s2 = s0)
  equcom(s0, s2)
  equcom(s1, s3)
  elopab(s2, s3, < s0, s1 >, w0)
  2sb5(s1, s3, s0, s2, w0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cop.s(s3, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: opelopabsb
blocks.content: The law of concretion in terms of substitutions. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm opelopabsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  sylib(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wne(cop(c0, c1), emptycls))
  necon2ai(cop(c0, c1), emptycls, wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  mtbiri(wceq(cop(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  mtbir(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  nex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nex(s1, wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  ax-mp(wn(wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)), wne(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  opnzi(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  necon3ai(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls, wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  eqcomd(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls, wa(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  simpl(wceq(emptycls, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  elopab(s0, s1, emptycls, w0)
  eleq1(cop(c0, c1), emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  opnz(c0, c1)
  jca(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  sbcex(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
  syl(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wcel(c1, universe), wex(s0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))
  spesbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
  exlimiv(s0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wcel(c1, universe))
  sbcex(s1, c1, w0)
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))), wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))), wb(wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0)))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wsb(hs1, s1, w0), wsbc(s1, c1, w0))
  dfsbcq2(hs1, s1, c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, w0)))
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0)))
  nfel2(s0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  nfopab1(s0, s1, w0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, w0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0)))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  opeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))
  chvar(s1, hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, w0)), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w0))
  nfbi(s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, w0))
  nfel2(s1, cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  nfopab2(s1, s0, w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs1, w0)
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, w0))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), cop(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)))
  opeq2(cv(s1), cv(hs1), cv(s0))
  sbequ12(s1, hs1, w0)
  opabid(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs1, s1, w0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm opelopabsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (< c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 } ‚Üî[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(< c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  sylib(< c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), < c0, c1 > ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  necon2ai(< c0, c1 >, emptycls, < c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  mtbiri(< c0, c1 > = ‚àÖ, < c0, c1 > ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, ‚àÖ ‚àà { < s0, s1 > | w0 })

  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c1, w2))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c1, w2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  sbciegf(s0, c0, universe, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(s1, c1, w2))
  nfsbc(s0, s1, c1, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  sbcbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w2)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, c1, w2), w1), wcel(c1, universe))
  sbciegf(s1, c1, universe, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm opelopabf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

} = {

  3sstr4g(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))))

  aleximi(s1, wi(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))
  anim2d(wi(w0, w1), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, w1)

  necon1bbii(copab(s1, s2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), emptycls, wex(s1, wex(s2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))

thm elopabr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {

  sylbi(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  elopab(s0, s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wcel(c0, c1))
  imp(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5ibr(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  biimpi(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: brabv
blocks.content: If two classes are in a relationship given by an ordered-pair class abstraction, the classes are sets. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Nov-2017.)
